entries.content:
You've been given the following message:
<message>Get me a list of 10 crypto websites currently offering airdrops.</message>

List the steps that you'll need to take in order to fulfill this message.

1. Gather a list of popular crypto websites that frequently offer airdrops.
2. Visit each website to check for current airdrop opportunities.
3. Compile a list of the top 10 crypto websites with ongoing airdrops.
4. Provide the compiled list to the user.
Are you able to perform all of these steps?
Yes, I can perform these steps. Please provide me with the list of popular crypto websites to begin

Step 1 will be performed by utilizing my knowledge of popular crypto websites and conducting research on the current airdrop offerings. I will gather a list of well-known crypto websites that are known for offering airdrops
